articles.description: Homage to iconic 22B packs 400bhp wrapped in new carbonfibre body
articles.content: Prodrive has revealed its very special and very expensive P25, a contemporary reimagining of the iconic Subaru Impreza WRX STI 22B the rare widebody two-door Impreza that was designed to celebrate Su… [+4692 chars]
